name: Trail of Disintegration - Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1
name_original: Trail of Disintegration - Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1
description:
This is my first time in a game jam, hope you enjoy the game!

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move

Space to jump

Objective:

Go through the levels, till you reach the end

To finish a level, collect the key and open the door with it

If you fall down to the bottom of the screen you respawn at the start of the level

If you touch any of the platforms, they will disappear in 3 seconds, so be quick!

Have fun :D

Character Controller 2D script made by Brackeys

Any feedback is greatly appreciated :)
